industry_overview: Educational technology (Ed-tech) refers to the use of computer hardware, software, and educational theory to facilitate learning and teaching. The Ed-tech industry encompasses companies that create and distribute commercial hardware, software, services, and platforms for the educational market, aiming for profit. The sector draws on knowledge from education, psychology, AI, and computer science, and includes online learning, mobile learning, and computer-based training.
target_market_segment: K-12 students, higher education students, adult learners, corporate training, and lifelong learners globally.
